title: Store purchases
body: something  is wrong with the store it wont let me buy certain skins of every champ. like azir, he recently came out with warring kingdom emperor and I'm unable to purchase it...why? same with ww I wanted to buy his grey ww skin or his feral skin, but I'm unable to purchase them from the store. yet if I click on ww or azir and look at their skins it shows ALL their skins.. why am I not able to purchase the skins I want? its happening with a lot more champs but I strongly  need an answer to this. I don't know if its a bug or simply you guys aren't allowing anyone to purchase these skins. its ridiculous I wanna spend my money on a skin that I want but I cant even buy a skin I want because itll only show me like 2 skins :/  . please help

replies.body:
There are many skins that are classified as legacy skins, meaning they were available in the store at one point but are no longer available for purchase. However, legacy skins do have a chance of returning to the store sometime in the future, with some being seasonal skins that are pretty much guaranteed to be available at a certain time of the year, like winter or Halloween skins.

Warring Kingdoms Azir is a seasonal Legacy skin, released for the celebration of Chinese New Year, so unfortunately it isn't likely to return until next year. Feral Warwick is a legacy skin, but it's not a seasonal one, so there's no guarantee of when it will make a return to the store. You're going to have to keep an eye out on the news page for when Riot opens the "legacy vault."

Grey Warwick, on the other hand, is a limited skin, and was only obtainable through the Refer-A-Friend program, similar to Medieval Twitch. Unfortunately the program is now retired, so there is currently no way to obtain the skin.

Hope this clears things up.

yes thank you. this really helped solved my questions. it is sad that I wont get to purchase warring kingdom azir until next year but at least I know now when itll be back. this information has definitely helped me out. I guess its back to hextech box and I gotta hope for the best.

Zombiemaster was spot on with everything (bless you)!  Any legacy skins that you're interested in could return to the store, but might also be found in hextech crafting or mystery gifts.  We also have a[ legacy skins](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins) guide with more info!  Let us know if that clears things up!
